text: Yeah there's just so many things to implement and time / resources are limited. I sometimes have to remind myself that you can already do a lot of nice things with Makie, and not dwell so much on all those other things that you can't. Because that would make for an overall frustrating development experience

text: I for one looooove makie. Which I hope you know. Keep on the amazing work! Tons of people use it for great things (research for a 10 people lab, most output  and diagnostics is with makie)!

text:
I've also switched to doing essentially of my scientific plotting with makie and I'm loving it :heart:

Is there a way to buy you guys a coffee?
